parameters.name: BucketAcl
parameters.description: The access control list (ACL) of the bucket. private public-read-write public-read

parameters.name: BucketName
parameters.description: The name of the bucket. This parameter can contain 3 to 50 characters in length and can contain only lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-). The name cannot start or end with a hyphen (-).

parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The description. The description can be 0 to 128 characters in length, and can contain Chinese characters and emoticons.

parameters.name: DispatchScope
parameters.description:
The scheduling scope. This parameter takes effect only when the value of the LogicalBucketType parameter is standard. Valid values:

*   **domestic**: Chinese mainland.
*   **oversea**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the node is located. If this parameter is not specified, the node is the global default node.

parameters.name: LogicalBucketType
parameters.description: The type of the logical bucket. Valid values: sink standard (default)
